Files Headings

offset.js

 
var Sntp = require('../lib');

Request offset once

 
Sntp.offset(function (err, offset) {

    console.log(offset);                    // New (served fresh)

Request offset again

 
    Sntp.offset(function (err, offset) {

        console.log(offset);                // Identical (served from cache)
    });
});
